value.title: Flagging Down A Roaming AI Self-Driving Car Robo-Taxi Might Not Be In The Cards
value.excerpt: Flagging down a taxi or cab is still something done today, and the question arises whether AI-based self-driving car robo-taxis will do the same.

value.title: AI Weekly: The implications of self-driving tractors and coming AI regulations
value.excerpt: AI regulations are on the way from governments including China. Plus, driverless tractors have reached the market -- with caveats.

value.title: Tesla announces Full Self-Driving package price increase to $12,000
value.excerpt: Tesla announced today that it is going to increase the price of its Full Self-Driving package to $12,000 starting on January 17. It should coincide with the release of an important new update. The Price of Tesla’s Full Self-Driving (FSD) package has been somewhat controversial.

value.title: New controversy in making? Tesla wants only cameras, AI to go fully autonomous
value.excerpt: Tesla chief Elon Musk has shared that the EV company will make a system based on cameras and artificial intelligence to attain full autonomy in driving.

value.excerpt: Venerable American farm equipment manufacturer John Deere and French agricultural robot start-up Naio debuted their latest innovations at the Consumer Electronics Show, which began Wednesday in Las Vegas.

value.title: University of Hawaii to compete in driverless car racing event in Las Vegas
value.excerpt: The University of Hawaiʻi will once again make history by competing in the world’s first-ever, head-to-head autonomous car racing competition scheduled to take place on Friday, Jan. 7.

value.title: Cadillac’s new self-driving concept is a luxury loveseat on wheels
value.excerpt: The InnerSpace concept looks like a futuristic car from the outside—but inside, there's a two-seat loveseat surrounded by one of the widest screens we've ever seen, and no steering wheel or pedals.

value.title: John Deere’s self-driving tractor arrives later this fall
value.excerpt: The 8R tractor has been in select customers’ hands for “a few seasons” now, according to John Deere. After all, like any kind of autonomous machinery, a self-driving tractor isn’t the kind of thing you just unleash on the world without extensive testing.

value.title: Pony.ai, Sinotrans Collaborate on Driverless Trucking
value.excerpt: Autonomous driving firm Pony.ai is working with Chinese logistics company Sinotrans to build a smart logistics network that uses autonomous trucking tech.

value.title: Intel's Mobileye unveils a chip that could bring self-driving cars to the masses
value.excerpt: Self-driving car technology is currently limited to test programs and specialized vehicles, but Mobileye thinks it can play a key role in making driverless vehicles you can actually buy. The Intel-owned company has unveiled an EyeQ Ultra system-on-chip designed with consumer self-driving cars in mind.

value.title: With Intel Mobileye’s newest chip, automakers can bring automated driving to cars
value.excerpt: Intel subsidiary Mobileye is plans to bring a new supercomputer to market designed to give passenger cars, trucks and SUVs autonomous driving powers. The company introduced Tuesday at the 2022 CES tech trade show a new system-on-chip called EyeQ Ultra that is purpose-built for autonomous driving.

value.title: Toyota Announces New Self-Driving Auto Software, Challenging VW And Daimler
value.excerpt: Year-end sales figures are expected to show Toyota breaking General Motors’ 95-year hold on the U.S. top spot.

value.excerpt: LG will unveil an in-car infotainment package for autonomous vehicles that will turn cars into a work, exercise or virtual camping space.
